name: Pillow
description:
Pillow is a short mystery adventure game and a love letter to PS1-era survival horror. It interweaves memory and video game history into a pixelated web of nostalgia.

🔎 Assume the role of a young boy and search for your grandfather deep inside an urban realm of ghosts and graffiti.

🔦 Wield  an array of magic flashlights to exorcise ghosts and illuminate your way through a concrete otherworld.

👻 Search hiding spots to find long-cherished video games (or malevolent spirits).

👴🏻 Wrestle with grandpa's otherworldly form.

🎬 Unearth a secret film.

🎨 Explore an underworld with an aesthetic torn straight from the jewel case of a PS1-era survival horror game.

But...as you search and hide, the lines between storyteller, player, and pawn melt away. Doesn't an avatar deserve memories of its own?


Pillow will run on most Windows PCs.* Depending on your skill level and curiosity, it has a length of about 15-30 minutes. This game can only be played with a mouse and keyboard.

*Some overzealous antivirus programs will block the Pillow installer from working properly. If you're comfortable with it, please disable your antivirus software during installation.
